item.description:
The SEPTEMBER meetup returns to the third Tuesday evening schedule and brings us back to Portland for an example of suburban permaculture possibilities.

Elaine and Francis will be hosting....

We will potluck around 6:30 then by 7:00 (if there's daylight) we'll have a look around at their place, hear about their "wish list" for their property and discuss some permaculture principles to apply to their place.

We will also brainstorm/review ideas for our dark season meetups when we may not have sunlight in the evenings...films/guest speakers/presentations from experienced members of the group...anything goes.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The Portland Maine Permaculture September Meetup
